EnrollCourseEventJavaStack: This course teaches you how to build full-stack web applications using Java (Spring Boot) for the backend and React.js for the frontend. You'll learn to design RESTful APIs, connect them with frontend components, manage state, and deploy full-stack apps.
EnrollCourseEventDataScience: Complete Data Science Bootcamp: From Basics to Advanced

This course covers the entire data science pipeline, including data collection, cleaning, analysis, visualization, and machine learning. You'll work on real-world datasets and use Python libraries widely used in the industry.
EnrollCourseEventDSAInJava: Mastering Data Structures and Algorithms in Java

This course provides a deep understanding of data structures and algorithms using Java. Ideal for coding interviews, it covers both conceptual clarity and implementation with hands-on coding challenges.
EnrollCourseEventMERNStack: Full-Stack Web Development with MERN Stack

Learn to build complete web applications using the MERN stack: MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js. This course includes frontend, backend, and database integration with real-world projects and deployment practices.
